channel.title: Staff Icon Help Needed!
channel.description:
Okay I am trying to make a donator status for my server so I attempted to move all the commands up to player rights.
Player rights 0 = Normal Player Player rights 1 = Donator Player rights 2 = Mod Player rights 3 = Server Admin Player rights 4 = Owner and Coder
How could I make the a Mod(Player rights 2) have a Moderator icon ect. Server Admin(Player rights 3) have an admin icon And owner and coder(player rights) have a owner icon????
If it is any help I'm using SkilltlezRule_V43 317 server and same with the client!

item.title: Staff Icon Help Needed!
item.dc:creator: @Kalvin Kalvin
item.description:
@Kalvin wrote:

That’s the client side… just add mod icons in your client

Read full topic

item.title: Staff Icon Help Needed!
item.dc:creator: @PoonerAndy PoonerAndy
item.description:
@PoonerAndy wrote:

Okay I am trying to make a donator status for my server so I attempted to move all the commands up to player rights.

Player rights 0 = Normal Player
Player rights 1 = Donator
Player rights 2 = Mod
Player rights 3 = Server Admin
Player rights 4 = Owner and Coder

How could I make the a Mod(Player rights 2) have a Moderator icon ect.
Server Admin(Player rights 3) have an admin icon
And owner and coder(player rights) have a owner icon???

If it is any help I’m using SkilltlezRule_V43 317 server and same with the client!

Read full topic
